bibl.title: New Papyri from the New York University Collection: I.
bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Concordances [see in part. pp. 164-166: Bell numbers = Present Inventory Numbers = Publications]. - III. Texts: 1. Inv. 527. Homer, Ilias A 185-203. Provenance unknown, IIp; - 2. Inv. 65 (ex XVI, 18). Registration of Payments. Oxyrhynchus, ix-x.254p; - 3. Inv. 75 (ex XVIII, 47). Petition for Redress. Arsinoite nome, late Vp; - 4. Inv. 76 (ex III, 29a). Nomination of Liturgists Performing Dike Work. Oxyrhynchite nome, 3.iv.314p; - 5. Inv. 93 (ex XIVb, 83). List of Fishes. Provenance unknown, IVp?; - 6. Inv. 94 (ex XIVb, 83). List of Payments. Provenance unknown, IV/Vp; - 7. Inv. 96 (ex XIVb, 83). Fragment of a Land Register. Hermopolite Nome, IVp; - 8. Inv. 117 verso (ex XIVc, 84). Fragment of an Account. Oxyrhynchite nome, IIp; - 9. Inv. 221 (ex XIVb, 83). Fragment of a Lease. Provenance unknown, 11.x.250p; - 10. Inv. 452. Order for Transportation. Oxyrhynchite nome, 4.vii.407. - Pp. 184-186: Full list of attestations of the Oxyrhynchite era. - [P. N.Y.U. II, 1-10.]
bibl.seg: NIELSEN Bruce and Klaas A. WORP, New Papyri from the New York University Collection: I.
ZPE 133 (2000) pp. 163-186, 4 figg. et pll. I-II.

I. Introduction. - II. Concordances [see in part. pp. 164-166: Bell numbers = Present Inventory Numbers = Publications]. - III. Texts: 1. Inv. 527. Homer, Ilias A 185-203.
